subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN2056 is on the way

notification it has been shipped.

conversations.body_text: Sorry, your parcel was dispatched for you on the 19th after we received your despatch reminder, we only sent you a despatch notification today at work. We have been unable to cancel it for you, sincere apologies!

If that is the case, have you sent the correct one. Is was supposed to be
changed to the Plus X not the Pro X.

On Mon, Jul 21, 2025 at 4:44 PM service@simsonn.com

Further to my previous email, the tracking you provided says it has not
been picked up. Screenshot attached.

Why can't it be cancelled if it hasn't been picked up?



On Mon, Jul 21, 2025 at 4:44 PM service@simsonn.com

Can you please confirm which control box has been shipped?

You were going to change it to the plus model as the pro will not work with
my pedals.
Hi Dean Merchant,  It is the plus X control box, which is compatible with your Pro Plus pedal.
